title: Leave the big raptor for your jungler
body: Take the small ones to pad your CS numbers, idgaf. But leave the big one for your jungler. The smite buff is worth more than the gold. It's way too powerful to waste just because you want an extra 60g. Leave it alone.

replies.body: NO. I'M A SALTY ADC MAIN, IF I WANT BIRDIES I GET BIRDIES. ONE SEC MY MOM IS COMING IN OMG SHE JUST SAID I SHOULD DO MY HOMEWORK. FUCKING SLUT I HOPE SHE TRIPS ON A ROCK!

> [{quoted}](name=Ophelia Dusk,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TqEuo6j6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-09T17:02:59.105+0000)
>
> NO. I'M A SALTY ADC MAIN, IF I WANT BIRDIES I GET BIRDIES. ONE SEC MY MOM IS COMING IN OMG SHE JUST SAID I SHOULD DO MY HOMEWORK. FUCKING SLUT I HOPE SHE ~~TRIPS ON A ROCK~~ STEPS ON A LEGO!

Got to take it that one extra step.

Woah man.

We're salty, we're not monsters.

Monsters live in salty waters.
Coincidence?
Oh great another Jungler main insulting ADCs. Shows just how toxic and immature they are in game, then they wonder why everybody talks smack about junglers.
If you're going to take MY camps, the least you could do is give me the smite buff.

I am pretty sure that if they adc is stealing your camps it is BECAUSE he wants your smite buff. so this whole argument is kinda pointless. no ADC is going to go to the jungle to steal 2 little 5 gold pieces of garbage.

You do realize the only way they get the smite buff is if they smite it, right?
xD

Gromp, Wolves, Krugs, Raptors all require smite to get the buff, so saying the adc is taking it because they want the smite is simply insulting the adc you are trying to defend by calling them brainless idiots
He was calling them smite buffs, so i called them smite buffs. You are seriously confused because we are not talking about ADCS actually smiting the buff, just killing it for the gold.

Oh ok.
I was seriously confused, because you said they wanted the smite buff, which means they want the magic sight thing, when you really meant they want the gold.
I already got bored of this random conversations on the boards. See ya tomorrow, maybe.
i feel like you realize you were an idiot and instead of admitting to it you decided to be "cool" and act like this didn't mean a thing to you at all.
LEL you keep getting baited. Is almost funny.
im ....continuing to get baited? but this is my first comment...im now confused as to who you think responded to you.  mate i think you need to burn that fedora and get a life.
No it makes perfect sense.  You and that other guy are getting baited into getting him downvoted.  It's a genius plan.
i see....well in any case...back to league T_T
Isnt he the one who got baited since he apparently stuck around and still responded after he tried to act cool and walk away? I find his comments rather amusing tbh.
There's 3 of the little ones, and they're worth like 10g, and i can't count how many times my mid or my adc has randomly taken ALL 4 of the raptors to pad their cs by 4.

Oh great tell me more about your personal life...

 I can't count the times my junglers have come right after i died to take the last hit on the enemy champion. ( They were usually watching me die from a bush with full health).
No idea how this compares to our earlier argument, but if you want to use anecdotal evidence without any context, then be my guest.

Are you serious now? It's pretty obvious i was just trolling 9 days ago. Just look at all the people i made down vote me and reply to my comments.

You lack some common sense friend.

"Oh don't worry guys, i was just messing around. Haha, You're so gullible you fucking retards!"


Please delete your account.
Ok. I Cant argue with this liberal logic ,sorry, and good luck in life.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
pretty sure it's the mid laner that does it
Don't worry, the +2 AP from throwing a Q into the raptor camp when you have nothing else to do as Veigar is enough.
An equally terrible situation is when you're trying to do a level 3 clear only on red side but your mid steals experience from over the raptor wall.
They changed that...years ago I think.
It actually happened to me the other day; it was the first time it has ever happened to me. It could just be a bug that popped up.
It wasn't THAT long ago but it was still a change they made quite a few patches back.
Can you link me to the patch notes where it says that?

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-69-notes

Same time as the mage update

> [{quoted}](name=Moraru Maurice,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TqEuo6j6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-09T17:21:32.542+0000)
>
> An equally terrible situation is when you're trying to do a level 3 clear only on red side but your mid steals experience from over the raptor wall.

You don't understand how jungle camps work do you?

For a VERY long time it was possible to do this.
It was only a recent change, some people may not be aware yet.
4 months ago isn't really recent but okay.
i mean it does still happen, ive been playing mid and taken exp from raptors over wall. if a red buff or a DOT kill the camp the exp is AOE still.

it existed for far longer than 4 months, its baked into some peoples minds.

if i saw something happen for 3 years all the time, i would just accept and assume it still happens until told otherwise?
I think they only changed this for Gromp and Kruggs. It definitely happened 2 weeks ago when my mid was pushed under tower.
You know what I think, I think they may have only made the change for the LARGE monster.
Definitely, as my mid was asking me for a gank after I finished clearing and I was 1-2 creeps away from level 3.
{{champion:268}} Don't you ever talk to my mother that way

You know what..
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/bGjwMMlUhCQ/hqdefault.jpg
When you see them taking the big raptor as enemy minions are currently dying under our tower.
oh this, def this, we have waves to push, gtfo of my jg!

But the jungler also sometimes complains if you take a camp to take it all so that it resets. I think this is more of a game by game basis that you should let em know in. Personally I don't even touch my jungle unless my jungler isn't ganking or taking objectives, because then they're just consuming gold and experience without applying it to the team through map pressure, and it could be better used.

You have that backwards. That's exactly when you _shouldn't_ be taking camps.

If they're on the other side of the map doing something like taking scuttle, ganking, etc., they're not taking camps, so if you take one it'll almost certainly reset by the time they come back.
If they're farming up it's because they need those resources to contribute at a later time. Taking a jungler's camps while they're farming is like taking the wave out from under a laner. It's a big, toxic, "fuck you" just because you think you're better than them.

That's good information and a fair point I didn't think of. Would like to clarify I'm talking about like... twenty minutes in. I would never do it as a fuck you, but rather, laning phase is done and they still haven't come out of the jungle. Gotta take those camps to force em out sorta thing. Still sounds bad, lmao. But if they're on our inhib turret and the jungler's still farming up something's gotta change.

Yeah, the fucking shit laner who is somehow losing up to inhibitors in 20 minutes.

Don't fuck your jungler. They get 4x as much shit as you for doing a job 2x as complex as yours. Go back to failing lasthits instead of pretending you know how to jungle better when you don't even know how camp resets work dude. You're not "helping", you're just being an ignorant prick and putting your own team behind lol.

99% of the time, if a jungler in any league higher than bronze isn't having, it's because his laners wouldn't know how to set up, prepare for, or react to a successful ganking scenario even if the instructions were carved into their own arm. The other 1% are the Udyr mains who haven't figured out Feral Flare is gone.
calm down

Only time you take big raptor, is if allied jg is dead, death timer is long, and deny enemy jg.

ONLY TIME YOU TAKE IT!

Otherwise, let the jg smite it for buff, and get it for gold (as you need to let the poor fellow get some income too).
In my opinion Raptor buff is better than Cloud Drake
